text: András Haán (19 June 1946 - 5 January 2021) was a Hungarian basketball player and sailor. He was born in Budapest. He competed in the men's basketball tournament at the 1964 Summer Olympics. He also competed in the sailing at the 1976 Summer Olympics. Haán died on 5 January 2021 in Budapest, aged 74. ==References== Category:1946 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Sportspeople from Budapest Category:Sailors Category:Basketball players Category:Olympians for Hungary
title: András Haán
